definitions: Carry out or perpetrate (a mistake, crime, or immoral act).
Pledge or bind (a person or an organization) to a certain course of action or policy.
Send (someone) to prison, a psychiatric hospital, or another institution.
Formally refer (a bill or other measure) to a parliamentary committee.
Pledge oneself to a particular course of action or to a person or belief.
Transfer (data) from a temporary storage area to a permanent one.
examples: He did not commit the crime.
The company is committed to quality.
She was committed to a psychiatric hospital.
The bill was committed to a select committee.
Commit the changes to the database.
